segments.text: What time is our connecting flight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me check.Oh , oh ! It ’ s at 3:25 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , that's cutting it close ! That means we only have 25 minutes to make the connection ! What gate is it at ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , great ! That ’ s at the other end of the terminal !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , so here ’ s the plan ; When we land , run to gate 14 !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m be right behind ya !
segments.speaker: S1
